eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing

Class ParallelVMP

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing.ParallelVMP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm, Sampler

    public class ParallelVMP
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm, Sampler
    This class implements the interfaces InferenceAlgorithm and Sampler. It handles and implements the parallel Variational message passing (parallelVMP) algorithm.
